game.name: PAYDAY 2: The Biker Heist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All aboard!The Biker Heist Pack is the 34th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Biker Heist Pack comes with a two day Heist, weapons, masks, patterns, materials and 6 new achievements.A TWO DAY HEISTThe Elephant is after something, and Rust is the key to get it.
game.shortDescriptionEn: All aboard!The Biker Heist Pack is the 34th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Biker Heist Pack comes with a two day Heist, weapons, masks, patterns, materials and 6 new achievements.A TWO DAY HEISTThe Elephant is after something, and Rust is the key to get it.
